answers.answer: Hi,As mentioned from the other post, aside from nerve damage, this can also be due to injury, medication side effect, or medical conditions like diabetes, syphilis or  blocked vessel. It is best that you have this checked by your doctor for proper evaluation. Additional diagnostic tests may need to be done. Take care and best regards.
